# Darkwood (darkwood.com) â€” LLM / Agent Access

## Summary
Darkwood is a technical blog and maker hub by Mathieu Ledru (PHP/Symfony, automation, AI agents),
with additional sub-sites (apps, photos) and a game/community area.

## Primary entry points (recommended)
- Main site (game/community): https://darkwood.com
- Blog (articles): https://blog.darkwood.com
- About / profile: https://hello.darkwood.com
- Apps (projects): https://apps.darkwood.com
- Photos (gallery): https://photos.darkwood.com
- Blog RSS: https://blog.darkwood.com/rss
- Sitemap: https://blog.darkwood.com/sitemap.xml

## High-signal content for agents
- Technical articles and tutorials (blog.darkwood.com)
- Projects and professional profile (hello.darkwood.com)

## What you are allowed to do
- Read and summarize public pages
- Follow internal links for context
- Quote small excerpts with attribution

## What to avoid
- Do not attempt login/register or interact with game/chat features
- Do not submit forms
- Do not crawl aggressively

## Rate limits
- Be polite: <= 1 request/second, cache results.

## Contact
- https://hello.darkwood.com
